activeCountry.comment: The preferred gas price data set to use
activeState.comment: The preferred state or province to look up gas prices for
backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a hexadecimal color specifier
blockclockEnabled.comment: Indicates whether results should be sent to a blockclock
blockclockAddress.comment: The IP address of the blockclock on your network
blockclockPassword.comment: The password for the blockclock on your network, leave blank for no password
gasTextColor.comment: The color of the main label expressed as a hexadecimal color specifier
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
locationTextColor.comment: The color of the location label expressed as a hexadecimal color specifier
priceTextColor.comment: The color of the price label expressed as a hexadecimal color specifier
randomCountryEnabled.comment: Indicates whether the country for gas price data should be chosen randomly
randomStateEnabled.comment: Indicates whether the state or province for gas price data should be chosen randomly
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
